MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH42 postcode area of Birkenhead, affecting properties in Victoria Fields, Dewberry Close and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07:24AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs needed to an underground cable, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:52AM on 4th January 2021
